title: Motley Fool Money: 07.27.2012
description: Earnings news from Facebook, Apple, Amazon.com, Starbucks, and ExxonMobil.   Motley Fool co-founder Tom Gardner talks investing philosophy,  Whole Foods, Zillow,  and LinkedIn.
content:encoded: Earnings news from Facebook, Apple, Amazon.com, Starbucks, and ExxonMobil.   Motley Fool co-founder Tom Gardner talks investing philosophy,  Whole Foods, Zillow,  and LinkedIn.
